update base_goods_sku
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update base_goods_sku set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attribute_ids = #{attributeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, list_pic_id = #{listPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specification_pic_id = #{specificationPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, main_pic_id = #{mainPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.id ,t3.sale_price ,t1.product_model_number ,t1.pic_id ,t2.attribute_value_id ,t2.attribute_name ,t2.attribute_value_name ,t4.pic_path from base_product t1 left join product_attribute t2 on t2.product_id = t1.id inner join platform2c_product_rel t3 on t3.product_id = t1.id AND t3.putaway_state = 1 and t3.platform_id = 14 left join res_pic t4 on t4.id = t1.pic_id where t1.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t1.goods_spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t1.is_deleted = 0

select t1.id ,t1.product_id ,t1.inventory ,t1.price ,t3.pic_path specification_pic ,t1.specification_pic_id from base_goods_sku t1 left join res_pic t3 on t3.id = t1.specification_pic_id left join platform2c_product_rel t5 on t5.product_id = t1.product_id where t1.spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t5.putaway_state = 1 and t5.platform_id = 14
mapper.update:
update base_goods_sku
inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
specification_pic_id = #{specificationPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.id ,t1.pic_id ,t2.sale_price ,t3.pic_path from base_product t1 left join platform2c_product_rel t2 on t2.product_id = t1.id left join res_pic t3 on t3.id = t1.pic_id where t1.company_id = #{companyId} and t1.goods_spu_id = #{spuId} and t2.platform_id = 14
SELECT dashboard_config FROM miniprogram_dashboard_config WHERE app_id = #{appId} AND is_deleted = 0
